

```{r}
# create data.frame recipe_task
recipe_task <- tibble::tribble(
  ~wp, ~activity, ~start_date, ~end_date,
  "Description", "1.ReadME", "2023-12-01", "2023-12-20",
  "Description", "2.Project proposal", "2023-12-01", "2023-12-10",
  "Topic selection", "1.Data collection", "2023-12-01", "2023-12-04", 
  "Topic selection", "2.First meeting", "2023-12-03", "2023-12-04",
  "Data", "1.Data wrangling", "2023-12-05", "2023-12-08",
  "Shiny app", "1.Structure", "2023-12-06", "2023-12-09",
  "Shiny app", "2.Algorithm Design", "2023-12-08", "2023-12-12",
  "Shiny app", "3.Optimization", "2023-12-12", "2023-12-15",
  "Package", "1.Structure", "2023-12-10", "2023-12-14",
  "Package", "2.Function code", "2023-12-14", "2023-12-16",
  "Package", "3.Roxygen2", "2023-12-16", "2023-12-16",
  "Package", "4.Test", "2023-12-17", "2023-12-18",
  "Website", "1.Creation", "2023-12-18", "2023-12-20"
)

print(recipe_task)
```


```{r}
gantt_plot <- ganttrify(
  project = recipe_task,
  by_date = TRUE,
  exact_date = TRUE,
  size_wp = 6,
  size_activity = 4,
  line_end_wp = "round",
  line_end_activity = "butt",
  month_date_label = TRUE,
)
print(gantt_plot)
```
